title: 01/12/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/12/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's National Title Game. How much of a leap did Devonta Smith make in the NFL Draft with his performance. We're joined by ESPN's Sal Paolantonio, who tells us that the Eagles did indeed fire Doug Pederson. JC Tretter, Browns Center calls in to discuss their big win against the Steelers and look ahead to the Chiefs. And Head Coach of the Bucs Bruce Arians tells us why he prefers fans at the game, even as the away team.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's National Title Game. How much of a leap did Devonta Smith make in the NFL Draft with his performance. We're joined by ESPN's Sal Paolantonio, who tells us that the Eagles did indeed fire Doug Pederson. JC Tretter, Browns Center calls in to discuss their big win against the Steelers and look ahead to the Chiefs. And Head Coach of the Bucs Bruce Arians tells us why he prefers fans at the game, even as the away team.
